thread.title: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week
thread.title_full: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week

author: Megan Camponovo
title: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week
text: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week From a good Samaritan rescuing a pig that was "tossed like a football" along a Mardi Gras parade to a man being rescued two days after driving off a cliff, here are some of the videos you may have missed this week: Good Samaritan rescues pig 'tossed like a football' along Mardi Gras parade route A [piglet](/article/good-samaritan-rescues-pig-along-mardi-gras-parade-route/46963693) that was tossed around on a parade route during Mardi Gras has been rescued. A good Samaritan rescued the young pig after she saw three men tossing it around like a football at a park near the parade route. The pig, who now has a new name of "Piglet," was not hurt during the ordeal, but was very scared. Watch the video in the player above. Man rescued 2 days after driving off Big Sur cliffside in California A California man was [rescued](/article/watch-man-rescued-2-days-after-driving-off-big-sur-cliffside-in-california/60024861) on Tuesday after driving his car off a Big Sur cliffside and falling 400 feet. The man, who crashed while driving home from his job, was first reported missing after not returning home on Sunday night. Wild video shows man climbing Florida cellular tower to livestream on social media According to deputies, the Hillsborough County Sheriff's Office aviation unit was called around 7 p.m. on Feb. 24 after reports that an individual was [climbing a cellular tower](/article/florida-man-climbing-cellular-tower-video/46995065). HCSO said the individual was climbing back down the tower after livestreaming a video to his social media. The aviation team was able to direct ground deputies to the location of the climber. Handcuffed car theft suspect outruns officers in Philadelphia A Philadelphia [car theft suspect](/article/philadelphia-handcuffed-suspect-flees/46976306) who had his hands cuffed behind him fled from two police officers outside a hospital where he had been taken for examination, police said Monday. Puppy spotted along an interstate on-ramp in Boston quickly finds a new home A [young puppy](/article/puppy-found-interstate-on-ramp-rescued/46980204) that was recently found along an on-ramp heading toward Interstate 93 in Boston, Massachusetts, did not take long to find a new place to call home.
